ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds - The Scorpius Run
ComicInfo.Summary: The Scorpius Run [Part 1]: While in an unexplored sector of space, the Enterprise answers a distress call from an alien ship, which leads to a chain of events where the tyrannical ruler of the sector forces the Enterprise to compete in a starship race called the Scorpius Run or face destruction.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 01:57:04. [CVDB1010618] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:09:15. [Issue ID 2564501]
ComicInfo.Writer: Mike Johnson,Ryan Parrott,Mike Johnson,Ryan Parrott,Kirsten Beyer
ComicInfo.Characters: Lt. La'an Noonien-Singh,Zephyx,Corsok,Ensign Nyota Uhura,Seryn,Doctor Joseph M'Benga,unnamed aliens,Nurse Christine Chapel,Lt. Commander Una Chin-Riley [Number One],Vallestus,Captain Christopher Pike,Lt. Spock,Aisla,Lt. Jenna Mitchell,Lt. Erica Ortegas
ComicInfo.Title: The Scorpius Run [Part 1]
